item.title: Poone add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Poone add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Poone add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Poone add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Most people are other people. Their thoughts are someone else's opinions, their lives a mimicry, their passions a quotation." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Poone add a quote by Jarod Kintz
item.description: "She didn't say it, I only thought she said it. So really it was my thought, my words, and not hers. How could I confuse "I love you" with "May I take your order?" -- Jarod Kintz

item.title: Poone add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Is it possible, in the final analysis, for one human being to achieve perfect understanding of another? We can invest enormous time and energy in serious efforts to know another person, but in the end, how close can we come to that person's essence? We convince ourselves that we know the other person well, but do we really know anything important about anyone?" -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Poone add a quote by Pete Wentz
item.description: "Sometimes when it looks like I'm deep in thought I'm just trying not to have a conversation with people." -- Pete Wentz

item.title: Poone add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Poone add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Poone add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Poone add a quote by Socrates
item.description: "The unexamined life is not worth living." -- Socrates

item.title: Poone add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Love is the absence of judgment." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Poone add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "To give pleasure to a single heart by a single act is better than a thousand heads bowing in prayer." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Poone add a quote by Vincent Willem van Gogh
item.description: "I dream my painting and I paint my dream." -- Vincent Willem van Gogh

item.title: Poone add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Poone add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Poone add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Don't think or judge, just listen." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Poone add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "The possession of knowledge does not kill the sense of wonder and mystery. There is always more mystery." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Poone add a quote by J.D. Robb
item.description: "No. No, I don't believe you'd betray me with her. I don't believe you'd cheat on me. But I'm afraid, and I'm sick in my heart that you might look at her, then at me. And regret." -- J.D. Robb

item.title: Poone add a quote by Sara Shepard
item.description: "The sweetest smiles hold the darkest secrets..." -- Sara Shepard

item.title: Poone add a quote by Eoin Colfer
item.description: "In my experience, boys are predictable. As soon as they think of something, they do it. Girls are smarter—they plan ahead. They think about not getting caught." -- Eoin Colfer

item.title: Poone add a quote by Arthur Conan Doyle
item.description:
"Is there any point to which you would wish to draw my attention?'
'To the curious incident of the dog in the night-time.'
'The dog did nothing in the night-time.'
'That was the curious incident,' remarked Sherlock Holmes." -- Arthur Conan Doyle

item.title: Poone add a quote by Thomas Moore
item.description: "It is only through mystery and madness that the soul is revealed" -- Thomas Moore

item.title: Poone add a quote by Charles Baxter
item.description: "When all the details fit in perfectly, something is probably wrong with the story." -- Charles Baxter

item.title: Poone add a quote by Stevie Nicks
item.description: "Little girls think it's necessary to put all their business on MySpace and Facebook, and I think it's a shame...I'm all about mystery." -- Stevie Nicks

item.title: Poone add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "Love is an endless mystery, because there is no reasonable cause that could explain it." -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Poone add a quote by Derek Landy
item.description: "Every solution to every problem is simple. It's the distance between the two where the mystery lies." -- Derek Landy

item.title: Poone add a quote by Salvador Dalí
item.description: "People love mystery, and that is why they love my paintings." -- Salvador Dalí

item.title: Poone add a quote by Diane Ackerman
item.description: "It began in mystery, and it will end in mystery, but what a savage and beautiful country lies in between." -- Diane Ackerman

item.title: Poone add a quote by Jean-Jacques Rousseau
item.description: "She was dull, unattractive, couldn't tell the time, count money or tie her own shoe laces... But I loved her" -- Jean-Jacques Rousseau
